message:
Gulam agomer raiye por holud mediar news dekhlam.gulam agomer gramer bari dekhacche.gram bashi bolche taranaki gulam agomer raiye sontosto na.atocho jader dekhecche tara gulam agomer gramer kewna.tara amader gramer lok ekjon amader cheyarmen ar baki sov tar chela.tara amader ekhaner awamiligh o chaguliger lok.gulam agomer bari.bramanbaria jila.nabinagar thana.birgon grame ar sooting koreche bramanbaria jilar.nabinagar thanar ekti sorkari dakbanglorte.ar ekhane amar gramerbari.ami golam agomer gramebarir ek jon murubbike jiggasha korechilam 1971re golam ajomer abostan ki chilo tini bollen golam agom rajkar amara ekhan suntechi.1971 sale jokhon juddo cholchilo tokhon ja sunini akhon sunchi.ar sov banowat abong mitta.sovi hocche rajniti. 

[Fan post]
